Uses of Interface
io.avaje.inject.BeanScopeBuilder.ForTesting

Packages that use BeanScopeBuilder.ForTesting
Package Description
io.avaje.inject
Avaje Inject API - see BeanScope.

  • Uses of BeanScopeBuilder.ForTesting in io.avaje.inject

    Methods in io.avaje.inject that return BeanScopeBuilder.ForTesting
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    BeanScopeBuilder.ForTesting BeanScopeBuilder.forTesting()
    Extend the builder to support testing using mockito with withMock() and withSpy() methods.
    BeanScopeBuilder.ForTesting BeanScopeBuilder.ForTesting.withMock​(Class<?> type)
    Use a mockito mock when injecting this bean type.
    BeanScopeBuilder.ForTesting BeanScopeBuilder.ForTesting.withMock​(Class<?> type, String name)
    Register as a Mockito mock with a qualifier name.
    <D> BeanScopeBuilder.ForTesting BeanScopeBuilder.ForTesting.withMock​(Class<D> type, Consumer<D> consumer)
    Use a mockito mock when injecting this bean type additionally running setup on the mock instance.
    BeanScopeBuilder.ForTesting BeanScopeBuilder.ForTesting.withSpy​(Class<?> type)
    Use a mockito spy when injecting this bean type.
    BeanScopeBuilder.ForTesting BeanScopeBuilder.ForTesting.withSpy​(Class<?> type, String name)
    Register a Mockito spy with a qualifier name.
    <D> BeanScopeBuilder.ForTesting BeanScopeBuilder.ForTesting.withSpy​(Class<D> type, Consumer<D> consumer)
    Use a mockito spy when injecting this bean type additionally running setup on the spy instance.
